bianju: Francisco Castro / 郑继宗 / Lisa Clemens / 约翰尼·马丁
name: 昏神 Delirium
intro: )   　　A group of young men dare a classmate to reach the porch of a legendary old house, said to be haunted by the thirteen victims of a family massacre. In hopes of making a viral video they arm him with a video camera to prove he was there or to capture him fleeing in terror before even reaching the house, as others have. When he doesn't return, the guys must go in to get him. Inside they discover the truth about the house, the fate of their friend and their own fate as well.
comments: 在众多主视角恐怖片里可以说是相当无聊了。
评分这么低我为什么还要看呢？因为觉得海报还有、意思。所有人都出现在照片里这个桥段还不错
就是一个进入鬼屋探险的伪纪录片故事，主角团有一个最开始幻视的应该本来就是这家的孩子没啥恐怖画面，建议主角团改成“傻屌帮”合适。比较科学的就是主角们还知道轮流出镜换着拿录像机...
actors: 迈克·C·曼宁 Mike C. Manning
格里芬·弗里曼 Griffin Freeman
瑞恩·平克斯顿 Ryan Pinkston
特里萨·纳瓦罗 Teresa Navarro
